subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As Steve Nash prepares to turn 40, it is the stretching, pulling and activating of the most ancillary muscles, almost like daily physical therapy, that will determine how he finishes his career.
snippet: As Steve Nash prepares to turn 40, it is the stretching, pulling and activating of the most ancillary muscles, almost like daily physical therapy, that will determine how he finishes his career.
